data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To be able to live in an affordable area, I commute nearly one hour each way to my office. Fortunately, my ____ compensates ____ for ____ expense ____ commuting. And ____ the ____ is ____ the ____, I can ____ while I am ____. This allows me to catch up on work and be more productive.
data.partBlankContent: To be able to live in an affordable area, I commute nearly one hour each way to my office. Fortunately, my com____ compensates m_ for t__ expense o_ commuting. And bec____ the tr__ is o_ the tr___, I can wo__ while I am trav_____. This allows me to catch up on work and be more productive.
data.fullContent: To be able to live in an affordable area, I commute nearly one hour each way to my office. Fortunately, my company compensates me for the expense of commuting. And because the trip is on the train, I can work while I am traveling. This allows me to catch up on work and be more productive.
data.answer: 为了能住在经济实惠的地区，我每天上下班要花近一个小时。幸运的是，我的公司补偿了我的交通费。而且因为是在火车上旅行，我可以一边工作一边旅行。这让我可以赶上工作进度，更有效率。
